release.notes:
Includes printed inner sleeve with credits, artwork and band photo.
Recorded and mixed at Sigma Sound Studios and Shakedown Sound Studio, New York. Additional recording at Compass Point Studios, Bahamas. Mastered at Europadisk, Inc., New York.
